00075 #ifndef _Direction_h
00076 #define _Direction_h
00077 
00078 #include "BaseSRF.h" 
00079 #include "Exception.h"
00080 
00081 namespace srm
00082 {
00083 
00088 class EXPORT_SRM_CPP_DLL Direction
00089 {
00090 public:
00094     BaseSRF *getSRF() const
00095     {
00096         return _srf;
00097     }
00098 
00102     void getRefCoord( Coord3D &coord ) const;
00103 
00106     const SRM_Long_Float *getRefCoord() const;
00107 
00110     void getDir( SRM_Vector_3D vec ) const;
00111 
00114     SRM_Long_Float getVectorComp1() const;
00115 
00118     SRM_Long_Float getVectorComp2() const;
00119 
00122     SRM_Long_Float getVectorComp3() const;
00123 
00128     SRM_Long_Float getVectorComp( SRM_Integer index ) const;
00129 
00132     void setVectorComp( const SRM_Long_Float comp1,
00133                         const SRM_Long_Float comp2,
00134                         const SRM_Long_Float comp3 );
00135 
00140     void setVectorComp( const SRM_Integer    index,
00141                         const SRM_Long_Float comp );
00142 
00145     void setVector( const SRM_Vector_3D vec );
00146 
00149     bool isEqual( const Direction &dir ) const;
00150 
00153     Direction* makeCopy() const;
00154 
00155 protected:
00156     friend class BaseSRF_3D;
00157 
00162     Direction(      BaseSRF       *srf,
00163               const SRM_Vector_3D  ref_coord,
00164               const SRM_Vector_3D  vec );
00165 
00168     virtual ~Direction()
00169     {
00170         _srf->release();
00171     }
00172 
00173     Direction &operator =( const Direction & )
00174     { return *this; } 
00175 
00178     BaseSRF *_srf;
00181     SRM_Vector_3D _ref_coord;
00184     SRM_Vector_3D _vec;
00185 };
